title: (x) Sans used on Gallery de Soto website - Paralucent {Yves}
content:
Hi guys and gals:

What is this gently styled sans used in the Gallery de Soto website? It’s not Helvetica for sure... but cute though.

[http://www.gallerydesoto.com/home/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080626202236/http:/www.gallerydesoto.com/home/index.html "http://www.gallerydesoto.com/home/index.html")

Thanks for helping,

Mike Diaz :-)

 [‹ need to find font similar to Metro Goldwyn Mayer logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20080626202236/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36676 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Deco-ish caps "Brooklyn Cyclones" - Cholla Sans {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080626202236/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36722 "Go to next forum topic")
author: SuperUltraFabulous

comments.content:
Thanks Yves! The S in soto threw me off track- thank you!!!

Mikey :-)
